startedAt.description: When response started filling up in the app (iso 8601)

submittedAt.description: When response was submitted in the app (iso 8601)

evidences.description: Evidence types (codes). 100 - None, 101 - Cut down trees, 102 - Cleared areas, 103 - Logging equipment, 104 - Loggers at site, 105 - Illegal camps, 106 - Fired/burned areas, 107 - Evidence of poaching

loggingScale.description: Logging scale (0 - not sure, 1 - small, 2 - large)

damageScale.description: Damage scale (0 - no visible tree disruption found, 1 - small number of trees cut down, 2 - medium number of trees cut down, 3 - large area substantially clear cut)

responseActions.description: Actions that were taken (codes). 200 - None, 201 - Collected evidence, 202 - Issue a warning, 203 - Confiscated equipment, 204 - Issue a fine, 205 - Arrests, 206 - Planning to come back with security enforcement, 207 - Other

guardianId.description: A guardian id from which the event was received
